channel.title: Running Virtual Machines
channel.description: I use VMWare a lot.  Not only do I use it for demonstrations of Teamprise, I also use it for day-to-day development and testing (one of the joys of developing a cross platform product that talks to a Microsoft server...
channel.dc:creator: Martin

item.title: Comment by Ben+00:00
item.description: Fantastic tip! Given most of my dev is run on VMWare I'm definitely going to run it from an external drive - ta! (^ ^)
item.dc:creator: Ben
